data.title: Gordon Ramsay's shocker: Tana aims to expand family of 7 with more kids
data.meta_description: Gordon Ramsey, the British celebrity chef that we all know for having a tough demeanor and being a hard-boiled egg in the kitchen, has been happily married to Tana and they have 5
data.text:
Gordon Ramsey, the British celebrity chef that we all know for having a tough demeanor and being a hard-boiled egg in the kitchen, has been happily married to Tana and they have 5 kids together, however, Mrs. Ramsay is planning on having another one!

The Ramsey clan up to now is of 7, including Gordon, 56, and Tana, 49, who are parents to Megan, 25, Jack and Holly, 23, Tilly, 21, and Oscar, 4

Gordon Ramsay laughed at his wife's reason for having another baby

Ramsay is indeed a person who is hard on camera but also is a hoot and a half, as he showed in his interview where he claimed "I'm going to be at school celebrating sports day with a f---ing walker!" Gordon says, laughing. "'Hey, who's your granddad?' 'That's my dad, actually.' So I'm not too sure how many knee-hip replacements they'll get by the time they get 21, but I'm going to try."

The British celebrity chef laughed at his wife's reason for having another baby, "she says she doesn't want Oscar growing up on his own,". "On his own?" Ramsay exclamated with great surprise "He's at school every day, and he's got his four siblings! So, oh man, watch that space. . .. I'm f---ed."

Tana Ramsay adds "I'm one of four, Gordon's one of four, so it's sort of second nature to me," she said while Gordon began describing their kids' personalities "Jack's a Royal Marine commando, off defending the country in some of the most extreme conditions,"

Ramsay is proud their children's academic achievements

He also opened up about how proud he is of their children's academic achievements "Megan's an incredible police officer. Holly's gone into fashion. Tilly's studying at university for her degree. Tana and I came from a family with no degrees."

Meanwhile, he added that Oscar was a cool kid, "He's only 4, but he's grown up rapidly because of his four older siblings."
